name: get_channel_panels
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twitch_api.
Tool description: Detailed API for twitch. Stream data, streamer data, chat data, streamer cards data etc.
for twitch.
API description: Fetches the channel panels for a specified Twitch channel using the Twitch API.

channel.description: The name of the Twitch channel to retrieve panels for.
